The Tunnel to Summer, the Exit of Goodby.Title: The Tunnel to Summer, the Exit of Goodbyes
The Tunnel to Summer, the Exit of Goodby.Text: Based on the award-winning light novel, this film tells the story of two high school students who discover a mysterious tunnel that can grant their deepest wishes—but at a great cost. As they explore its depths, they must confront their pasts and the choices they wish they could change.

Spy x Family: Code: White.Title: Spy x Family: Code: White
Spy x Family: Code: White.Text: The first movie from the wildly popular Spy x Family franchise, 'Code: White' sees the Forgers embarking on a new, high-stakes mission that could either bring them closer together as a family or tear them apart. Expect a mix of thrilling action, comedy, and heartwarming moments.

The First Slam Dunk.Title: The First Slam Dunk
The First Slam Dunk.Text: A cinematic adaptation of the classic sports manga, 'The First Slam Dunk' brings the excitement of high school basketball to the big screen. With intense matches and the personal growth of its characters, this movie is a must-watch for sports anime fans.

Suzume.Title: Suzume
Suzume.Text: Directed by Makoto Shinkai, 'Suzume' follows the journey of a young girl who must close mysterious doors that are causing disasters across Japan. The movie is visually stunning and emotionally resonant, exploring themes of loss, resilience, and hope.

Blue Giant.Title: Blue Giant
Blue Giant.Text: An adaptation of the critically acclaimed manga, 'Blue Giant' tells the story of a young man who dreams of becoming the world’s greatest jazz musician. With a powerful soundtrack and inspiring narrative, this film celebrates the passion and dedication of musicians.

Black Clover: Sword of the Wizard King.Title: Black Clover: Sword of the Wizard King
Black Clover: Sword of the Wizard King.Text: This original story set in the Black Clover universe sees Asta and the Magic Knights facing off against a former Wizard King who has returned to reclaim his throne. Packed with action and intense battles, this movie expands the lore of the series.

Psycho-Pass: Providence.Title: Psycho-Pass: Providence
Psycho-Pass: Providence.Text: The latest entry in the 'Psycho-Pass' franchise, 'Providence' delves deeper into the dystopian world of the Sybil System. With new mysteries to unravel and old enemies to face, this film is a gripping continuation for fans of the series.

To Every You I've Loved Before / To Me,.Title: To Every You I've Loved Before / To Me, The One Who Loved You
To Every You I've Loved Before / To Me,.Text: These two interconnected films explore alternate realities and the different paths love can take. A unique and thought-provoking exploration of parallel universes, these movies challenge the notion of destiny and what it means to love someone.

Mobile Suit Gundam: Cucuruz Doan's Islan.Title: Mobile Suit Gundam: Cucuruz Doan's Island
Mobile Suit Gundam: Cucuruz Doan's Islan.Text: A retelling of a classic episode from the original 'Mobile Suit Gundam' series, this movie dives into the story of Cucuruz Doan, a former Zeon soldier who chose to live in peace. The film explores themes of war, peace, and the cost of human life.

That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime:.Title: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime: Scarlet Bond
That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime:.Text: Rimuru and his friends embark on a new adventure in this original movie set in the world of 'That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime'. With a new enemy threatening the peace, this film brings the beloved characters back for more action-packed fun.
